original: @120b ;;rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @120b ;;rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: a'arya panytsa pidsha ti ka pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a mu kha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
analyzed: a'arya panytsa pidsha ti ka pra dzny'a p'a ra mi t'a mu kha n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /
translated: Ārya-pañcaviṃśatisāhasrikāprajñāpāramitāmukha-nāma-mahāyānasūtra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo /
translated: The Noble Great Vehicle Sūtra Called The Twenty-Five Gates of the Perfection of Wisdom

original: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
analyzed: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
translated: Thus have I heard at one time.

original: bcom ldan 'das ri rab @121a *//
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ri rab @121a *//
translated: The Blessed One was dwelling on the peak of Mount Meru

original: kyi zom la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
analyzed: kyi zom la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnas na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te /
translated: in the night-time abode of all the gods, together with many hundreds of thousands of millions of billions of bodhisattvas.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang / lha'i bu dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang / lha'i bu dang / lha ma yin dang / rlung lha dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / srin po dang / rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang /
translated: Then the Blessed One, surrounded and venerated by a great and vast assembly of gods, sons of gods, demigods, wind gods, garuḍas, nāgas, yakṣas, kinnaras, rākṣasas, all vidyādhara-s,

original: 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs shin tu mang shing rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston te /
analyzed: 'byung po dang / log 'dren dang / sha za dang / snang ba dang / mi snang ba'i ma mo'i tshogs shin tu mang shing rgya che ba dpag tshad lnga'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang / dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston te /
translated: bhūta-s, evil spirits, piśāca-s, and a multitude of mātṛkā-s, both visible and invisible, all gathered in a maṇḍala five yojanas in extent, and by a retinue of one thousand two hundred and fifty bhikṣu-s, taught the Dharma.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing rig pa'i tshogs dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bar snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing rig pa'i tshogs dang / phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang / rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bar snang las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te /
translated: Then the bodhisattva mahāsattva Vajrapāṇi, surrounded by all the vajra families, by all those assemblies of knowledge mantras and assemblies of mudrās, and by many millions of knowledge-mantra holders, went to where the Blessed One was, and having arrived, descended from the sky and bowed his head at the feet of the Blessed One.

original: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Having circumambulated the Blessed One three times, he sat to one side. Then the Blessed One said to the Lord of Secrets, Vajrapāṇi:

original: gsang ba pa'i bdag po //
analyzed: gsang ba pa'i bdag po //
translated: Lord of Secrets,

original: nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams ni /
analyzed: nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnams ni /
translated: these twenty-five

original: nga'i shes @121b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no //
analyzed: nga'i shes @121b rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no //
translated: are the gates to my perfection of wisdom.

original: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas!

original: aom byang chub kyi sems rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom byang chub kyi sems rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: “Oṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom of vajra bodhicitta.

original: aom kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: “Oṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom of Samantabhadra’s conduct.

original: aom yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: “Oṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom of the wish-fulfilling jewel.

original: aom 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: “Oṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom of non-cessation.

original: aom skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: “Oṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom of arising.

original: aom rnam par shes pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom rnam par shes pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: “Oṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom of all consciousnesses.

original: aom 'bar ba chen po'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //🔽aom brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom 'bar ba chen po'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o // aom brtson 'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: “Oṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom of the dharmatā of great blazing.🔽“Oṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom of diligence.

original: aom thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: “Oṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom of omnipresence.

original: aom rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sems shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ, the mind of stability of all vajras is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.

original: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the pure nature of phenomena is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.

original: aom rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //🔽aom las rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o // aom las rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ, the purification of karma is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.

original: aom nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phat shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phat shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of definite wrath is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.

original: aom 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ, the purity of desire and attachment is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.

original: aom mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes @122a *//
analyzed: aom mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes @122a *//
translated: Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of speed is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.

original: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ, hūṃ is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.

original: aom h'um thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom h'um thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-pervading is the gateway to the perfection of wisdom.🔽 Oṃ, the vajra-possessor of the all-

original: aom hr'i: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo //
analyzed: aom hr'i: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo //
translated: Oṃ hrīḥ. The perfection of wisdom gate.

original: aom aa zhes bya ba'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //🔽aom shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom aa zhes bya ba'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o // aom shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ a. The perfection of wisdom gate.🔽Oṃ prajñāpāramitā. The perfection of wisdom gate.

original: aom aam bam h'um shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom aam bam h'um shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ aṃ baṃ huṃ. The perfection of wisdom gate.

original: aom aem shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom aem shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ e. The perfection of wisdom gate.

original: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo //
analyzed: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo //
translated: Oṃ supreme body of all tathāgatas. The perfection of wisdom gate.

original: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ pure speech of all tathāgatas. The perfection of wisdom gate.

original: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: aom de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra mind of all tathāgatas. The perfection of wisdom gate.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do ////
translated: The Blessed One having said this, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Vajrapāṇi, the entire assembly, and the world with its gods, humans, asuras, and gandharvas rejoiced and praised what the Blessed One had said.

original: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba /
analyzed: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba /
translated: The Noble Twenty-Five Gateways to the Perfection of Wisdom

original: theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so //
translated: The Mahāyāna Sūtra is completed.
